import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Input data files are available in the "../input/" directory.

    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.8e59ec7c:
#word cloud
from wordcloud import WordCloud, ImageColorGenerator
text = " ".join(str(each) for each in df.postings)
# Create and generate a word cloud image:
wordcloud = WordCloud(max_words=200, background_color="black").generate(text)
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
# Display the generated image:
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation='Bilinear')
plt.axis("off")
plt.show()
source.79bf7561:
categorical_cols = [cname for cname in df.columns if
                    df[cname].nunique() < 10 and 
                    df[cname].dtype == "object"]


# Select numerical columns
numerical_cols = [cname for cname in df.columns if 
                df[cname].dtype in ['int64', 'float64']]
print(numerical_cols)
print(categorical_cols)

source.7e9197ce:
labels1=df.postings.value_counts().index
sizes1=df.postings.value_counts().values
plt.figure(figsize=(9,9))
plt.pie(sizes1,labels=labels1,autopct="%1.1f%%")
plt.title("Burning Glass Technologies",size=15)
plt.show()

source.2026b6ba:
import plotly.offline as pyo
import plotly.graph_objs as go
lowerdf1 = df.groupby('postings').size()/df['Unnamed: 3'].count()*100
labels = lowerdf1.index
values = lowerdf1.values

# Use `hole` to create a donut-like pie chart
fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Pie(labels=labels, values=values, hole=.6)])
fig.show()

source.93729128: Burning Glass Technologies, a leading labor market analytics firm. Burning Glass makes use of the power of data and AI technologies that have cracked the genetic code of the job market.  Powered by the world’s largest and most sophisticated database of jobs and talent, Burning Glass delivers real-time data and breakthrough planning tools that inform careers, define academic programs, and shape workforces. Burning Glass has helped to fill millions of jobs and its data drive initiatives for more than a dozen state and national governments. Matt Sigelman the CEO is consulted frequently by national media, by researchers, and industry leaders.https://www.burning-glass.com/about/leadership/
